name: Computer Science Tools
description: A curated collection of CS-focused learning products, covering everything from first-year foundations to advanced project resources.

name: Mechanical Engineering Tools
description: A bundle of mechanical-engineering learning aids, guides, and tools designed to help users explore concepts and build practical skills.

name: Electrical Engineering Tools
description: A set of electrical-engineering resources, circuit helpers, and structured material for anyone exploring the field.

name: Textile Engineering Suite
description: A neatly organized set of textile-engineering study and project tools, offering multi-semester guidance and practical insights.

name: Civil Engineering Tools
description: A collection of civil-engineering learning products with structured information for design, surveying, and construction concepts.
